alert.note: Alert for Val Verde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 25 at 5:59PM CDT until September 25 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Val Verde County in south central Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 558 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 17 miles northeast of Pandale, or 20 miles northwest of Juno, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Juno. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This is a dangerous storm. Prepare immediately for large destructive hail capable of producing significant damage. People outside should move to shelter inside a strong building, and stay away from windows.
